TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MultiBinding extends System.Windows.Data.BindingBase implements class System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild
Public Class MultiBinding Inherits BindingBase Implements IAddChild
public ref class MultiBinding : System::Windows::Data::BindingBase, System::Windows::Markup::IAddChild
type MultiBinding = class inherit BindingBase interface IAddChild

summary.span: 描述附加到单个绑定目标属性的 对象的集合。

span.span: Describes a collection of objects attached to a single binding target property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以指定多个绑定中的对象。You can specify multiple bindings in a object. 当你使用对象使用转换器，它会生成这些绑定的值为基础的绑定目标的最终值。When you use the object with a converter, it produces a final value for the binding target based on the values of those bindings. 例如，可以从红色、 蓝色和绿色值，可以是来自相同或不同的绑定源对象的值来计算颜色。For example, color might be computed from red, blue, and green values, which can be values from the same or different binding source objects. 一个值，当移动时从目标到源，目标属性值被转换为一的反馈到绑定的值。When a value moves from the target to the sources, the target property value is translated to a set of values that are fed back into the bindings. 值并属性决定的功能和用作默认值的集合中的所有绑定除非单个绑定替代这些属性。The values of the and properties determine the functionality of the and are used as the default values for all the bindings in the collection unless an individual binding overrides these properties. 例如，如果上的属性对象设置为，然后在集合中的所有绑定将被都视为除非设置不同上的绑定之一的值显式。For example, if the property on the object is set to , then all the bindings in the collection are considered unless you set a different value on one of the bindings explicitly. 有关详细信息，请参阅和属性。For more information, see the and properties. 当前仅支持 类型的对象，而不支持 或 类型的对象。 currently supports only objects of type and not or .

value.span: 将 子级添加到 对象会将该子级隐式添加到 对象的 集合。

span.span: Adding a child to a object implicitly adds the child to the collection for the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 可以在此属性设置[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]只能通过使用所示的语法或通过访问的集合对象并使用它的各种方法，如`Add`。This property can be set in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] only by using the syntax that is shown, or by accessing the collection object and using its various methods, such as `Add`. 用于访问的集合对象的属性是只读的而集合本身是可读/写。The property used to access the collection object is read-only, whereas the collection itself is read/write. ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *oneOrMoreBindings**oneOrMoreBindings* 一个或多个对象。One or more objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合中的各个绑定可以具有其自己的值。Individual bindings in the collection can have their own value . 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *myConverter**myConverter* 对实现的类的资源引用界面，其中包含的实现和方法。A resource reference to a class that implements the interface, which includes implementations of the and methods. 若要引用的值转换器，请使用[标记扩展和 WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/markup-extensions-and-wpf-xaml.md)。To refer to a value converter, use the [Markup Extensions and WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/markup-extensions-and-wpf-xaml.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *converterParameter**converterParameter* 值转换器，这可能是对象元素或字符串，具体取决于定义和这两个属性键入正在使用的 XAML 功能所需要的类型和转换器的实现。A value of the type expected by the converter, which might be an object element or a string depending on the definition and XAML capabilities both of the property type being used and of the implementation of the converter. 转换器将在通过该类型中获取`parameter`参数定义由其和实现。The converter takes in that type through the `parameter` parameter as defined by its and implementations.

member this.Mode : System.Windows.Data.BindingMode with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示此绑定的数据流的方向。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates the direction of the data flow of this binding.

value.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 默认值为 ，它返回目标依赖属性的默认绑定模式值。

span.span: The default value is , which returns the default binding mode value of the target dependency property.

value.span: 但是，每个依赖属性的默认值都不同。

span.span: However, the default value varies for each dependency property.

value.span: 一般情况下，用户可编辑的控件属性（例如 ）默认为双向绑定，而其他大多数属性默认为单向绑定。

span.span: In general, user-editable control properties, such as , default to two-way bindings, whereas most other properties default to one-way bindings.

value.span: 确定依赖属性绑定在默认情况下是单向还是双向的编程方法是：使用 获取属性的属性元数据，然后检查 属性的布尔值。

span.span: A programmatic way to determine whether a dependency property binds one-way or two-way by default is to get the property metadata of the property using and then check the Boolean value of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值并属性决定的功能和用作默认值的集合中的所有绑定除非单个绑定替代这些属性。The values of the and properties determine the functionality of the and are used as the default values for all the bindings in the collection unless an individual binding overrides these properties. 例如，如果上的属性对象设置为，然后在集合中的所有绑定将被都视为除非设置不同上的绑定之一的值显式。For example, if the property on the object is set to , then all the bindings in the collection are considered unless you set a different value on one of the bindings explicitly. 有关详细信息，请参阅和属性。For more information, see the and properties.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个处理程序，可使用该程序提供自定义逻辑，旨在在更新绑定源值期间处理绑定引擎遇到的异常。

span.span: Gets or sets a handler you can use to provide custom logic for handling exceptions that the binding engine encounters during the update of the binding source value.

summary.span: 这仅适用于你已将 与 对象相关联的情况。

span.span: This is only applicable if you have associated the with your object.

value.span: 一个提供自定义逻辑以在绑定源值更新过程中处理绑定引擎遇到的异常的方法。

span.span: A method that provides custom logic for handling exceptions that the binding engine encounters during the update of the binding source value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示用于检查绑定源属性在更新期间引发的异常的内置验证规则。The class represents a built-in validation rule that checks for exceptions that are thrown during the update of the binding source properties. 如果您具有相关联对象与您对象，可以使用此属性设置一个处理程序来提供自定义逻辑来处理这些异常。If you have associated the object with your object, you can use this property to set a handler to provide custom logic for handling these exceptions. 有关示例，请参见 。For an example, see . 有关验证过程的详细信息对象，请参阅属性。For more information about the validation process for objects, see the property.

value.span: 一种确定依赖属性的默认 值的编程方法是使用 获取属性的属性元数据，然后检查 属性的值。

span.span: A programmatic way to determine the default value of a dependency property is to get the property metadata of the property using and then check the value of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值并属性决定的功能和用作默认值的集合中的所有绑定除非单个绑定替代这些属性。The values of the and properties determine the functionality of the and are used as the default values for all the bindings in the collection unless an individual binding overrides these properties. 例如，如果上的属性对象设置为，然后在集合中的所有绑定将被都视为除非设置不同上的绑定之一的值显式。For example, if the property on the object is set to , then all the bindings in the collection are considered unless you set a different value on one of the bindings explicitly. 有关详细信息，请参阅和属性。For more information, see the and properties.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否包含 。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to include the .

value.span: 如果包含 ，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to include the ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性，可以使用的替代方法元素显式。Setting this property provides an alternative to using the element explicitly. 是用于通过引发的错误检查的内置验证规则的源对象实现。The is a built-in validation rule that checks for errors that are raised by the implementation of the source object. 如果引发错误，则绑定引擎就会创建并显示错误并将其添加到的绑定元素集合。If an error is raised, the binding engine creates a with the error and adds it to the collection of the bound element. 错误缺乏清除此验证的反馈，除非另一个规则会生成验证问题。The lack of an error clears this validation feedback, unless another rule raises a validation issue. 有关验证过程的详细信息对象，请参阅属性。For more information about the validation process for objects, see the property. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性，可以使用的替代方法元素显式。Setting this property provides an alternative to using the element explicitly. 是检查的源属性更新过程中引发的异常的内置验证规则。The is a built-in validation rule that checks for exceptions that are thrown during the update of the source property. 如果引发异常，绑定引擎就会创建与该异常并将其添加到的绑定元素集合。If an exception is thrown, the binding engine creates a with the exception and adds it to the collection of the bound element. 错误缺乏清除此验证的反馈，除非另一个规则会生成验证问题。The lack of an error clears this validation feedback, unless another rule raises a validation issue. 有关验证过程的详细信息对象，请参阅属性。For more information about the validation process for objects, see the property. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当是`true`，该绑定检查并报告的实现的数据源引发的错误。When is `true`, the binding checks for and reports errors that are raised by a data source that implements .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ValidationRules As Collection(Of ValidationRule)

summary.span: 获取此 实例的 对象的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of objects for this instance of .

value.span: 此 实例的 对象的集合。

span.span: The collection of objects for this instance of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以同时设置验证规则对象以及个人中的对象对象。You can set validation rules on both the object and the individual objects in the object. 绑定引擎将计算上对象时的值移到绑定目标属性从对象。The binding engine evaluates the on the object when a value moves from the binding target property to the object. 此后，如果从转换器移到单个绑定，绑定源属性的值绑定引擎将计算上的对象。After that, when a value moves from the converter to the binding source property of an individual binding, the binding engine evaluates the on that object. 有关验证过程以及如何提供在失效时的可视反馈的详细信息，请参阅"数据验证"中[数据绑定概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。For more information about the validation process and how to provide visual feedback upon invalidation, see "Data Validation" in [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md). > [!NOTE] > 可以在此属性设置[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]只能通过使用语法所示，或通过访问的集合对象并使用它的各种方法，如`Add`。This property can be set in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] only by using the syntax shown, or by accessing the collection object and using its various methods, such as `Add`. 用于访问的集合对象的属性是只读的而集合本身是可读写。The property used to access the collection object is read-only, whereas the collection itself is read-write. ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *oneOrMoreValidationRules**oneOrMoreValidationRules* 一个或多个对象。One or more objects. 可以使用类或创建自定义规则通过子类化类。You can use the class or create your custom rules by subclassing the class.

span.span: Binding Validation Sample
